content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: bread
inventory=[{"type": "rabbit_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 34, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 57, "index": 20}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 23}, {"type": "cooked_mutton", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 30}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 28, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "polished_diorite_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 37}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 12, "index": 38}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 60, "index": 39}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 35, "index": 40}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 55, "index": 41}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 37, "index": 42}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft bread, I first need to craft wheat. Wheat requires placing 1 hay_block in the crafting table, therefore I will move the hay_block from slot 25 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: bread
inventory=[{"type": "wheat", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "hay_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "rabbit_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 34, "index": 18}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 57, "index": 20}, {"type": "panda_spawn_egg", "quantity": 30, "index": 23}, {"type": "cooked_mutton", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "blackstone_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 30}, {"type": "smooth_quartz", "quantity": 28, "index": 32}, {"type": "polished_andesite_stairs", "quantity": 53, "index": 33}, {"type": "polished_diorite_slab", "quantity": 40, "index": 37}, {"type": "blue_dye", "quantity": 12, "index": 38}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 60, "index": 39}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 35, "index": 40}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 55, "index": 41}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 37, "index": 42}, {"type": "diamond_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that the wheat has been crafted, I need to move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) before I can craft the bread.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
